channel.title: Which to use
channel.description:
*note* Sorry if this is the wrong section*
I'm looking through clients and i'm not sure which one to use..I want to start off with a pretty fresh client, i would like to add my own stuff, gs's, stances, claws, etc etc etc..But i'm not sure of a good client to use. So what i need is suggestions on what client to use to start with. I'm not sure what base i'll be using, most likely delta (i know shitty base but its just for fun).
By the way, this is for a 317 of course
Thanks and yet again, sorry if its wrong section.

item.title: Which to use
item.dc:creator: @Motokid126 Motokid126
item.description:
@Motokid126 wrote:

[quote=“LilXCj, post:5, topic:340894”][quote author=Motokid126 link=topic=437289.msg3213448#msg3213448 date=1274487613]
One by Galkon? And do i use re named or non? Honestly im not sure the dif in renamed and non lol

EDIT: Everytime i try to log into any server the 317 deob freezes…I’ve tried alot of delta servers
[/quote]

It’s probably something your sources is trying to load but the 317 deob cannot do.[/quote]

Ah ok i see…hm.

Read full topic

item.title: Which to use
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“Motokid126, post:4, topic:340894”]One by Galkon? And do i use re named or non? Honestly im not sure the dif in renamed and non lol

EDIT: Everytime i try to log into any server the 317 deob freezes…I’ve tried alot of delta servers :([/quote]

It’s probably something your sources is trying to load but the 317 deob cannot do.
